content.html:
Thanks, I don't get any more errors now (on compiling, or sending), but it doesn't look like the BaseStation is receiving anything. Just sending a dummy message to test it: this->client->SendTo("5 31.00 2.20 -5.00", "BaseStation");

I added some logging statements on the other side (GameLogicPlugin.cc) but it doesn't look like it's received.
